/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11  -Wall -W -g -O0   CMakeFiles/static_target.dir/static_target.cpp.o  -o ../../../../bin/static_target_d -Wl,-rpath,/home/pang/software/g2o/lib:/usr/local/lib -rdynamic ../../../../lib/libg2o_solver_cholmod_d.so ../../../../lib/libg2o_core_d.so ../../../../lib/libg2o_stuff_d.so -lrt -lcholmod -lamd -lcolamd -lcamd -lccolamd /usr/local/lib/libmetis.so -Wl,-Bstatic -lsuitesparseconfig -Wl,-Bdynamic -lcblas -lf77blas -latlas -llapack
